description: This file contains a list of all World ID repositories. Descriptions are automatically pulled from GitHub.

list.name: IDKit
list.description: Javascript toolkit to interact with the World ID protocol. Building the Identity SDK.

list.name: World ID Starter Kit - Foundry
list.description: Quick start. Starter kit with Foundry to deploy your own smart contract that verifies unique-humanness with World ID.

list.name: World ID Starter Kit - Hardhat
list.description: Quick start. Starter kit with Hardhat to deploy your own smart contract that verifies unique-humanness with World ID.

list.name: Worldcoin Simulator
list.description: Web simulator of the Worldcoin app to test the World ID protocol on the staging network.

list.name: Worldcoin Docs
list.description: Developer documentation for the Worldcoin SDK and World ID.

list.name: World ID #petorbz
list.description: World ID Example. Dapp, smart contract and landing page for #petorbz. Adopt a plush orb in person and receive an NFT certificate of adoption.

list.name: Discord Bouncer
list.description: Improve your Discord server by verifying unique people with World ID.

list.name: Worldcoin Developer Portal
list.description: The Worldcoin Developer Portal provides tools to interact with the Worldcoin SDK. Easiest way to get started with World ID.

list.name: World ID x Lens
list.description: Human verification for Lens Protocol with World ID.

list.name: World ID x Lens Dapp
list.description: Frontend used to verify Lens accounts. Smart contract: https://github.com/worldcoin/world-id-lens
